about_the_game:
Special guide for those who want to unlock everything there is to see in Westview Academy - Season 1!

This PDF is split by path highlighting the important choices you need to make to maintain each girl's route.
It also includes easy-to-follow instructions on how to unlock every achievement in the game!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains uncensored sexual content, as well as lighter graphical violence

detailed_description:
Special guide for those who want to unlock everything there is to see in Westview Academy - Season 1!

This PDF is split by path highlighting the important choices you need to make to maintain each girl's route.
It also includes easy-to-follow instructions on how to unlock every achievement in the game!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
